name: WonderfulHusband
0:
”Alexa, open wonderful husband”
”Alexa, start wonderful husband”
”Alexa, launch wonderful husband”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: wonderful husband
des:
This skill will provide ladies with all of the compliments, words of comfort and encouragement that they are looking from their husbands.

These are the available compliments;
One ; You are beautiful
Two ; You make me want to be a better man
Three; Thanks for your faithfulness to our family
Four; You are a godly woman
Five; I’ve learned a lot from you
Six; You’re the finest woman on the planet
Seven; Our kids are so fortunate to have you as their mother
Eight; You’re as beautiful to me as the day we married
Nine; You bring out the best in me
Ten; You make loving fun
Eleven; God wanted me to be happy . . . that’s why He made you my wife
Twelve; I value your insight
Thirteen; I really admire your inner strength
Fourteen; I don’t know what I would do without you
Fifteen; My favorite place to be is with you
Sixteen; I wouldn’t be half the man I am without you
Seventeen; What a fantastic meal
Eighteen; I can face anything with you by my side
Nineteen; I don’t deserve you . . . but, I’m glad you’re mine
Twenty; God knew what I needed. That’s why He brought us together
Twenty One; I want to grow old with you
Twenty Two; I know you strive to please me . . . and believe me, you’re successful

The skill currently has twenty two encouraging words. To invoke any of the words just mention the corresponding numbers.

Enjoy!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
